p: The anticancer effect of the T. polium extract was investigated by MTT assay on two malignant lineages: mammary gland carcinoma (Walker 256/B cells) and prostate cancer (MatLyLu). Both cell lines have high metastatic potential and are commonly used to induce bone metastases [ 48, 49]. The cells were treated with the plant extract at different concentrations 0, 50, 100, and 200 Âµg/mL for 24 or 48 h.
